 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-statistics-regression-bin.zip application]
 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-statistics-regression-src.zip source code]
 * Browse the [https://code.google.com/p/accord/source/browse/trunk#trunk%2FSamples%2FStatistics%2FRegression source code online]

This sample application shows how to compute and use [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Statistics_Models_Regression_Linear_MultipleLinearRegression.htm Linear] and [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Statistics_Models_Regression_LogisticRegression.htmÂ´Logistic regression] models to fit, predict and analyse data. The sample application performs a  [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Statistics_Analysis_MultipleLinearRegressionAnalysis.htm linear regression analysis], computing a full [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Statistics_Testing_OneWayAnova.htm Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)] for input variables, and computes  [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Statistics_Analysis_LogisticRegressionAnalysis.htm significance tests for all model parameters through a logistic regression analysis].
